mapper.select: SELECT c.title ctitle, c.id id, count(DISTINCT ta.id) dcdb, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT mrec.id) FROM td_meetingrec mrec WHERE c.id = mrec.unitid ) AS qwhy, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT irec.id) FROM td_infosrec irec WHERE c.id = irec.unitid ) AS qwxx, ( SELECT count(DISTINCT drec.id) FROM td_doc_rec drec WHERE c.id = drec.unitid ) AS qwgw FROM t_tb_company c LEFT JOIN td_taskassign_unit tu ON c.id = tu.unitid AND c. STATUS = 1 LEFT JOIN td_taskassign ta ON tu.tassignid = ta.id GROUP BY c.title, c.id ORDER BY dcdb DESC, qwhy DESC, qwgw DESC, qwxx DESC

SELECT a.id as id, a.title as title, Totalnum as total, DealSuccNum AS wc, Totalnum - DealSuccNum AS zzbl, CASE WHEN DealSuccNum > 0 THEN cast( DealDate * 1.0 / DealSuccNum AS signed ) ELSE 0 END pjsj FROM ( SELECT com.title, com.id, sum( CASE WHEN taskunit.`status` = 4 THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) AS DealSuccNum, sum( CASE WHEN taskunit.id IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END ) Totalnum, sum( CASE WHEN taskunit.`status` = 4 THEN cast( timestampdiff( SECOND, assign.assigntime, deal.finishtime ) / 86400 AS signed ) ELSE 0 END ) AS DealDate FROM t_tb_company com LEFT JOIN td_taskassign_unit taskunit ON taskunit.unitid = com.id LEFT JOIN td_taskassign assign ON assign.id = taskunit.tassignid LEFT JOIN td_taskassign_unitdeal deal ON deal.taunitid = taskunit.id AND deal. STATUS = 1 GROUP BY com.id, com.title ) a ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT t.id tid, t.title ttitle,ta.id taid, ta.taskid tataskid, ta.worktype taworktype, ta.assigntime taassigntime, ta.assignmemo taassignmemo, ta.status tastatus,ta.charge tacharge,ta.phone taphone, ta.creatorid tacreatorid, ta.createtime tacreatetime, ta.closememo taclosememo,ta.endtime taendtime, CASE when sysdate()>tu.endtime then '已超期' else '未超期' end as is_exceed ,u.id uid,u.name uname,p.id pid,p.name pname,wt.title wtitle,e.step esstep ,tu.id tuid, tu.tassignid tutassignid, tu.unitid tuunitid,tu.personid tupersonid, tu.endtime tuendtime, tu.requirements turequirements, tu.status tustatus, tu.updatetime tuupdatetime, tu.createtime tucreatetime,tu.istimely tuistimely,c.id cid,c.title ctitle , tud.id tudid, tud.taunitid tudtaunitid, tud.dealdesc tuddealdesc, tud.status tudstatus, tud.isdelay tudisdelay, tud.pretime tudpretime,tud.pictures tudpictures,tud.files tudfiles, tud.creatorid tudcreatorid, tud.delaytime tuddelaytime, tud.creatorid tudcreatorid, tud.createtime tudcreatetime, tud.finishtime tudfinishtime FROM td_taskassign ta Left JOIN td_task t ON ta.taskid = t.id Left JOIN t_tb_work_type wt ON wt.id = ta.worktype Left JOIN t_tb_event_step e ON e.status=ta.status and e.event_type=1 Left JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = ta.creatorid Left JOIN td_taskassign_unit tu ON tu.tassignid = ta.id Left JOIN t_tb_company c ON c.id=tu.unitid LEFT JOIN td_taskassign_unitdeal tud ON tud.taunitid=tu.id Left JOIN sys_user p ON p.id = tu.personid
${ew.sqlSegment}

SELECT rec.unitid unitid,c.title ctitle,ch.itemdesc chitemdesc,count(rec.id) total from (select id, meetingid, checkitemid, checkvalue, createtime, unitid,`name` from td_meetingrec
${ew.sqlSegment} ) rec left join t_tb_company c on c.id=rec.unitid left join td_checkitem ch on ch.id=rec.checkitemid group by c.id ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT rec.unitid unitid,c.title ctitle,ch.itemdesc chitemdesc,count(rec.id) total from (select id, docassignid, checkitemid, checkvalue, createtime, unitid from td_doc_rec
${ew.sqlSegment} ) rec left join t_tb_company c on c.id=rec.unitid left join td_checkitem ch on ch.id=rec.checkitemid group by c.id ORDER BY total DESC

SELECT rec.unitid unitid,c.title ctitle,ch.itemdesc chitemdesc,sum(rec.checkvalue) total from (select id, infosid, checkitemid, checkvalue, createtime, unitid from td_infosrec
${ew.sqlSegment} ) rec left join t_tb_company c on c.id=rec.unitid left join td_checkitem ch on ch.id=rec.checkitemid group by c.id ORDER BY total DESC
